column1: The Purple Pig////As I explore and learn more about my taste buds and experiences while living
column2: join me on this journey of Mediterranean influenced
column3: tapas style of wonder! We started out with a pig meat platter which included a lot of fancy words describing each cut that I can't remember. Each small plate we ordered came out in random order
column4: they just brought out whatever was made first. We waited an hr to sit and it does seem busy at all hours of the day as we tried last night(Friday night) and were quoted a 4 hr wait time......ridiculous.
